entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries or rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
